definition: A document or list typically found in restaurants or cafes that displays a variety of food and beverage options available for customers to order from. It serves as a menu, providing descriptions and prices for each item, allowing customers to make informed choices about their meal selection.

examples.german: Kann ich bitte die Speisekarte haben?
examples.english: Can I please have the menu?

examples.german: Die Speisekarte bietet eine Vielzahl von Gerichten.
examples.english: The menu offers a variety of dishes.

examples.german: Die Speisekarte enth√§lt auch vegetarische Optionen.
examples.english: The menu also includes vegetarian options.
